name: Journey to the planet X-31
description:
The Journey to the planet X-31 is the cute 8-bit game that fallows the adventures of the cute space cat.

__________________________________________

-NOTE-

these is not the full game, it's just a demo.                                                                                               So keep these in the mind before playing

________________________________________________________________

-Controls-

P1-arrows to move,

P2-w,a,s,d to move.

Game supports Bluetooth devices.

________________________________________

Story:

One day 8544. year the humans send the small Space ship to the planet X-1338 but it crashes on the planet X-31. Cat needs to escape the crushed ship, find the safe place and materials to fix the ship to go back to the earth

__________________________________________________

-Credits-

Sebest401-programer of the game

xamuil2-tutorial for scrolling RPG game

GarboMuffin-Gamepad support
